website_summaries.verdict: A pop culture icon that appeals to artists as well as fans of the Joy of Painting series. Funko POP! collectors can also appreciate the adorable details.
pros: Fans of the artist Bob Ross rave about this figure's cute design and accurate details that include a paintbrush and paint palette
cons: Rare reports of the figure having features that were poorly or sparsely painted

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Adorable
customer_reviews.text: When I found a tiny mountain painting at a yard sale I knew I needed a Bob Ross to go with it. He is absolutely adorable with his little pallette and fan brush!! Also, he's quite sturdy and stands up on his own very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Love It. Bought it for boyfriend as one of the surprise Xmas gift. We bought a little easel for Bob as well. Going to paint the happy little trees here and there. 😍
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne C.

customer_reviews.title: FINDING BOB ROSS WAS A HAPPY ACCIDENT
customer_reviews.text: I was searching through the Amazon webpages - and there he was; staring back at me with his cute little art palette and big ole Afro! Of course, he had to come and live with me. I also sent a duplicate of him to live with our grownup daughter - an even bigger fan. This evokes such memories of our family watching Mr. Ross on PBS - day after day painting happy little trees and lazy little clouds - never making mistakes, only happy accidents. Thanks Amazon for this gift!
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great Pop of a great guy
customer_reviews.text: Completely adorable. The details are spot on, and this pop doesn't have trouble standing like so many of them do. I had insomnia for a long time, and honestly, I had tried everything. One afternoon I was searching for help with insomnia on different websites. I saw a post from a woman who had said she had the best sleep in a long time after falling asleep watching a Joy of Painting marathon. I figured I had nothing to lose. So, the next night I tried it. She was right....best sleep ever. So, my husband purchased this little guy to remind me of how awesome Bob Ross is...lol!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: My mentor and muse
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Little Funko Bob Ross is my mentor and muse. Watching "Joy of Painting" on Amazon Prime Video motivated me to buy some brushes and paints, and I'm hooked! So now I have Little Bob looking over my shoulder making sure I turn those "happy accidents" into happy trees/bushes/clouds/etc. Would have liked to see them get Bob's index finger on his left hand correct (he apparently lost part of this finger in a carpentry mishap as a young man), but this oversight is not worth taking a whole star away.
customer_reviews.author: Darwin

customer_reviews.title: Another great Funko-Pop to add to my collection
customer_reviews.text: I have over a 100 Funko-Pops in my collection, and this was certainly a welcomed addition into it. Everyone needs a little reminder from good old Bob every once and a while to stay happy and realize that there are no mistakes, only happy little accidents, and this pop is a really good reminder. Not only that, but there is a running joke among my friends that this looks like one of my friends, and that adds to it's worth in my book!
customer_reviews.author: theartigasfamily

customer_reviews.title: I <3 Bob!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this little Bob for my office. Sometimes you need a peaceful reminder at work ;) He appears as expected from the picture on Amazon. It was nicely packaged and new (as expected.) Additionally, I ordered a separate product the miniature Bob Ross Paint by Numbers (I can't get it to link at this moment). One or both of these would be great office gifts or white elephant gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Toodles!

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This figurine was perfect for my now husband. I used it as a topper on his grooms cake. He learned to paint by watching Bob as a kid. He painted a little scene to go on a mini easel and it was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Russo Baca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fans!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect cake topper for a bday party. The first Bob we ordered (foot in a paint can) wouldn’t stand up on its own. Returned for this one - zero issues now. Once the icing was cleaned off, he makes a great desk accessory.
customer_reviews.author: AKYGal

customer_reviews.title: I resisted the Funko Pop phenomenon until Bob Ross arrived.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn't get what was so awesome about a small body and big, square head. But this is Bob Ross; I need this happy little Pop in my life! And he's wonderful! From the paint palette to the outfit to the white boy fro, he is just wonderful! As Bob Ross--and as my first-ever Funko Pop--he will get a place of honor on the bookshelf and bring joy to anyone who sees him.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Anne Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Bob's paint strokes against the canvas were ,  louder than his whisper
customer_reviews.text: One of the koolest figures of pop culture. His show was so peaceful and laidback. The loudest part of the show was the paint strokes against the canvas. Had to have this pop.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is adorable! He was missing paint in a few minimal spots. He also had the black from his eye running down looked like mascara after you cry. So, I contacted Amazon and will be receiving a new one at no costs (which is why I gave this 5 starts) overall not too bad of condition for ordering blindly online, I've had worse.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Such fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a family member who loves Bob!! She was quite happy with it. Made with the same great detail that all the Funko Pop figures have, this one is sure to delight. Bob Ross has become quite an icon since his passing in 1995. The Joy of Painting and his lighthearted approach to designing “happy” trees and clouds have made him an indelible force in our popular culture. This adorable little guy would be a nice addition to any paint studio or comer of your home where one’s creativity is displayed.
customer_reviews.author: Song-of-Love

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this! My husband ordered it for me as a gift to keep me company while painting! It’s the cutest thing ever! It came packaged well no dents on the box BUT it did have a tiny little tear on the top left corner but I didn’t mind!
customer_reviews.author: Glendaaxo

customer_reviews.title: A Happy little display.
customer_reviews.text: I Love my little Bob! I have him on a shelf in my room with a mini canvas and easel display. I followed one of his tutorials on YouTube so he could be displayed with his own mini painting. I want to follow more tutorials and have a mini Bob Ross art collection to switch it up, and display with him. Super fun and adorable to look at. You can get the little canvases and easels at Walmart in the art section, a super cheap way to make a Happy little display.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: A Happy Little Funko Pop!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Bob Ross?! This figure is ADORABLE and well worth the money. If you're an artist or just a lover of Bob Ross, this is a great addition to your Funko Pop collection. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: SEBTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sculpt
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a figure of one of the most amazing painters that has lived. I love this guy, he sits next to my art supplies and every time I look at him, I am reminded about how there are no mistakes, just happy little accidents. Sometimes you just gotta chill. The sculpt is really nice and the palette really brings it all together.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: i love my bob ross
customer_reviews.text: i love my bob ross! i was very pleased to see that the 'paints' on my figurine's pallet were actually different colors and not just black like the photo looks like. he came in perfect condition, very happy! there was some VERY slight scratching on the box, not that it matters to me, but i know some folks are collectors and want pristine boxes as well!
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: He’s Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Such great quality and exactly a described! Art on the box was beautiful and it arrived nicely packaged and in perfect condition. If you’re a collector or just an artsy person, you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Bain

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love Bob Ross
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Bob Ross? I keep him in my classroom and all my students admire him. His hair is plastic same as his body but still looks like his afro, which I absolutely adore. Since he is so top heavy, he's fallen from my desk from time to time but he doesn't show it. I think he is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ambar

customer_reviews.title: Cute great for the kiddo
customer_reviews.text: My coworkers son has become obsessed with Bob so this was a great find! The box was pretty banged up when I received it and some of the paint is a bit uneven however he is 6 and this will be a toy for him so not as huge of a deal. Overall cute and good price compared to in stores locally they got closer to 15!
customer_reviews.author: Teal S.

customer_reviews.title: Bob is perfect, but the box is not
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Funko Pop I've ever bought. I mean its Bob freakin Ross. When it arrived I was a little bummed, because I had planned to keep him in the box. Unfortunately, the box has some scuffs on it like someone removed a sticker, and there's three pen/sharpie marks on the clear plastic right in front of his face. So I'm just gonna have to ditch the box, go with plan b, and set him up out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and amazing likeness
customer_reviews.text: How could a Bob Ross Funko Pop get anything less than 5 stars. Great quality and amazing likeness. I proudly display mine on my desk at work. The only negative is finding out just how many co-workers do not know who Bob Ross is. It's shameful really, but does give me the chance to spread some Bob Ross love.
customer_reviews.author: Lolly

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Funko of an Awesome Missed Individual
customer_reviews.text: I love Bob Ross! Ever need to just chill and relax to some soothing content? Check out a Bob Ross stream on Twitch (or I heard youtube as well) and it will do the trick. I hate that Bob had to leave the world but love the legacy he left. The Funko is great looking, as good of quality as any other Funko, and looks awesome on my desk at work. This is my favorite Funko, followed by the Doc from Back to the Future.
customer_reviews.author: llamuh

customer_reviews.title: Bob Ross is a 5.  My Funko Pop is not.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like people are rating Bob Ross instead of rating the Funko Pop. I rate Bob Ross a 5 for sure. He is the best. My Funko Pop is not. My Pop has a black ink fingerprint on the top of Bob's hair. It also has three grayish spots on his light blue shirt. The skin above his nose was rubbed or brushed while still wet. Not pleased. Hope to find in a store where I can see what it looks like before I purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Ordering this was no mistake; it wasn't even a happy accident.
customer_reviews.text: I've rocked my son to sleep watching Bob Ross every night since we brought him home from the hospital and I hope that, one day, this vinyl figure will remind him that it's ok to talk to trees, love animals, be a little bit crazy, and, most importantly, "...talent is a pursued interest; anything that you're willing to practice, you can do”.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Waters

customer_reviews.title: Let's build a happy little cloud
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? Let's build a happy little cloud. Let's build some happy little trees. It's Bob Ross as a Pop figure and it's exactly what you would expect., no surprises. Nice little detail on the pallete and the fan brush.
customer_reviews.author: T. JOINER

customer_reviews.title: and truly one of the better Funko representations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cousin who can't get enough Bob Ross. This is a spot on recreation of that famous painter, and truly one of the better Funko representations. My cousin flipped out at the random gift I bought him. So I would say this was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby D

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: I’d love to give this 5 stars however there was some minor but noticeable box damage and as a strict in the box collector the condition means a lot to me. I can tolerate it however I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: orangelemons

customer_reviews.title: Most. Awesome. POP.  Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite POP ever! I have it in my classroom and my students, who are also Bob Ross fans, are just infatuated by it. I move it around the room and play a game we call "Finding Bob". The first to find him gets a prize. This POP is great!
customer_reviews.author: RedDog

customer_reviews.title: Great Representation!
customer_reviews.text: It’s very well constructed and a nice representation of Bob Ross and it’s also highly giftable. My friend is an art teacher and she absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Bob Ross is the greatest thing on the planet.
customer_reviews.text: What could possibly be not to love!? Tiny Bob Ross is the best part of my desk - he keeps everything around him (plants, staplers, sticky notes, etc.) super positive all day long. I just with that tiny little 'fro was soft and bouncy like Bob's was.
customer_reviews.author: Baily

customer_reviews.title: Happy little gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a coworker’s daughter for her birthday. She is a HUGE Bob Ross fan and she loved it. It was a big hit. Great little, inexpensive desk pick-me-up or clever host gift for any Bob Ross fan.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Pagano

customer_reviews.title: Because, Bob Ross
customer_reviews.text: What do you buy for your teen that you accidentally crushed their spirit by casually mentioning Bob Ross has been dead since before they were born? A Bob Ross Bobble head, natch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it when it comes to Bob Ross
customer_reviews.text: Got this bobble head for my hubby for Christmas. We're huge Bob Ross fans, and he's a bit of a dork, so it was a great gift for him. ;) He loved it. I loved it. It's super cute and fun. Easy, simple gift to enjoy. A happy little bobble head.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what our granddaughter wanted. Amazon always come through with variety & great prices
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in a Pop
customer_reviews.text: My first Funko Pop and I could not be happier! This little Bob Ross is perfection. He arrived without a scratch secured in a lovely envelope of bubble wrap. Bob's calm demeanor comes across in this figurine. I feel more relaxed having him around.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and cute
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal on Bob Ross! I got for my tween daughter who loves everything Bob Ross. It sits on a shelf on her room and it inspired her to try and paint
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Angel Ford

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a huge fan Funko, but I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge fan Funko, but I had to get Bob Ross. It was the fact that the paint on the pallet nearly matches how he arranges his paints that sold it.
customer_reviews.author: LeahTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A masterpiece!
customer_reviews.text: Even his Funko Pop figure has a calming effect. It makes me want to paint "happy little trees" and make "happy little accidents". I just wish he came with a tiny landscape painting on an easel.
customer_reviews.author: CapnCaveman

customer_reviews.title: No mistake finding this. Just a “Happy Little Accident” 😉
customer_reviews.text: I introduced my 28 year old son to Bob Ross and he loves watching his shows on Netflix. This was a cute, unexpected gift “just because.” He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: MDD

customer_reviews.title: This is already my favorite POP in my collection
customer_reviews.text: This is already my favorite POP in my collection. I watched The Joy of Painting growing up and still watch it to this day on Netflix or whenever I can find it. I give a 3 only because the box the POP comes in was absolutely destroyed. I’m luckily not a "keep in the box” collector, if you are.. it could be an issue. Delivery was super fast. Was projected to arrive Monday, came on the Saturday prior.
customer_reviews.author: dmc12480

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to love?
customer_reviews.text: My daily smile. Such a cute decoration, and anything Bob Ross is 5 stars in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: The seller is an A**h***
customer_reviews.text: I just started getting into the funko collection. I orders this one to match my other bob Ross funko. It arrives today and the shipping box was perfect with no damage. I open it to find that the collectible funko I purchased seems to be a used hand me down. It definitely isn’t brand new. And come to find out there is no return policy. So great I get to have this crap leaning like a 3 legged giant on my self
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love bob ross
customer_reviews.text: Love bob ross, and this pop, Honestly my favorite pop I've bought. BEWARE none-pop enthusiasts, they are machine made and not hand painted, so the paint may be smudged/ messed up. Buying them online poses a risk at getting a defective paint job.
customer_reviews.author: OneLuckyZebra

customer_reviews.title: Without a doubt this is my favorite Funko Pop of all time
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt this is my favorite Funko Pop of all time. The box looks great and the figure is the best one yet. Don't pay the scalper $14, make sure to look in the Other Offers section and Amazon offers it for $10.99! Scalpers will ruin this hobby for us if we continue to support them!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Goblin

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Hubby as a little gift. He collects Funko figures. Bob Ross is his guilty pleasure..his Woosah show if you will. He loved the figure and it now sits on his desk at work to remind him to woosah when things get stressful. :0)
customer_reviews.author: yoohoo68104

customer_reviews.title: The little details and expression are great, I turned his head so it was like ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute! The little details and expression are great, I turned his head so it was like his body was facing a painting and his head was facing the camera. Probably one of my favorite Pops.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey D.

customer_reviews.title: Cute doll-package was damaged and taped.
customer_reviews.text: The doll was ok but the package was badly damaged and appeared to be taped. I was going to gift this to my niece but may reconsider now.
customer_reviews.author: Trc

customer_reviews.title: Needless to say I was happy to hear he was ecstatic to have his own ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this preordered fir a cousin who loves Bob Ross. It showed up earlier than expected. Did not matter much since my cousin thought I was kidding when I said I would buy it. Needless to say I was happy to hear he was ecstatic to have his own mini bob Ross on his mantle.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition!
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to my Funko collection on my bookshelf at work and I purchased the Paint by Numbers kit to add the little picture beside him. It's perfect and looks so cute. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Great Price! Perfect Condition! My Daughter Loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Besides, who wouldn’t love a Bob Ross Funko figurine? Shipped very quick and the best price for this makes it a wonderful gift!
customer_reviews.author: LemonChecks

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute. Great for a young teen who collects Funko Pops and loves Bob Ross.
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky gal

customer_reviews.title: Smashed box
customer_reviews.text: The box was totally smashed weight sucks because I’m an in box collector.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Dunkler

customer_reviews.title: Bob Ross Funko
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a Funko fan and a Bob Ross fan. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Leon

customer_reviews.title: Good Addition to My Collection . . .
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Bob Ross? As an oil painter, I've stolen some aspects of his style of painting over the years. Can't beat his 'zen style'; it's almost like meditation you watch.
customer_reviews.author: Normi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cake Center Piece
customer_reviews.text: I Used this Pop Vinyl As My Cake Topper and it Look Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra V.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for art lovers
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a Christmas gift to my artist daughter. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Happy Little Trees!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 12-year old daughter for Christmas. She LOVES it!! The detail is so nice, and it’s just a fun little Bob Ross to display in her room :)
customer_reviews.author: McPickle

customer_reviews.title: Bob Ross in the house!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever!!! Loved watching Bob Ross as a kid and he definitely contributed to my love of art. Now he joins us in our art/homeschool room and inspires a new generation of artists. So cool!
customer_reviews.author: MeliH

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I love funko pop and I’m a painter so when I saw bob Ross I couldn’t resist.
customer_reviews.author: Corry

customer_reviews.title: BOB ROSS!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 5 Stars all the way. I throw my boxes away, and it even came in perfect condition. How you like me now, people who collect their boxes! Perfect condition box and thrown away, mic drop.
customer_reviews.author: a4wendzi

customer_reviews.title: Bob Ross
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for a Bob Ross fan. Big hit, she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous5

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after watching the documentary on Netflix about Funko and wanting one to add to the decor of my sewing room. I've always been a big fan of Bob Ross, and having him above my sewing table makes me so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Adelaide

customer_reviews.title: The figure itself is painted perfectly and is easy to stand
customer_reviews.text: Bob Ross, a real angel. This figure became the star of our christmas tree, and has brought plenty of cheer to all of our guests. The figure itself is painted perfectly and is easy to stand.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Having him on my desk brings me the same sense of peace watching The Joy of Painting did when I was little
customer_reviews.text: I had literally no interest in Funko Pops until they released Bob here. I had to have him. Having him on my desk brings me the same sense of peace watching The Joy of Painting did when I was little.
customer_reviews.author: T. G. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Super fun. Reminds me of my childhood
customer_reviews.text: Bob Ross is a huge staple in my childhood. My best friend purchased one of these for me for my b-day and I loved it so much I bought one for my sister's desk. I cannot wait for the other ones to come out
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Super cute bobblehead doll
customer_reviews.text: Brought it as a gift for my sister. She loves it. Simply for Nostalgia sake she's an artist and cherishes has this item.
customer_reviews.author: Y Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Gave as Christmas presents. They were happy to receive. I want aware I was getting 2 of them though. But I had another friend who also loves Bob Ross so it worked our.
customer_reviews.author: mzshank

customer_reviews.title: Thoughts of happy little trees
customer_reviews.text: I keep this at work for when I can't binge this on YT or other streaming. Thoughts of happy little trees, happy accidents, and van dyke brown, make any day better.
customer_reviews.author: Peter D.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Little Funko
customer_reviews.text: I love my little Bob Ross! He makes me smile every time I see him and reminds me that there are no mistakes just happy accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a Keeper!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for my artist friend's big 6-0, especially in light of the fact that she dressed up like Bob Ross for Halloween and won first prize! Super cute collectable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy little accidents
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love love Bob ? Funkos already make me happy and being this loving character makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: D. Palace

customer_reviews.title: Sparse painting on Bob's mustache
customer_reviews.text: The paint on Bob's mustache is a little sparse and sloppy. He even looks a little sad about it. Perhaps he'll cheer himself up by painting a happy tree.
customer_reviews.author: Straight Outta the Suburbs

customer_reviews.title: Cool pop for the Bob Ross fans
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my sister and she liked it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Bumgarner

customer_reviews.title: I love Bob Ross
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Bob, right? I never bought a Funko Pop before but when this came out, I had to have it. Then later I notice more versions became available. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Bob Ross Doll!!
customer_reviews.text: They still run repeats of Bob Ross on my local PBS station. Couldn't resist this figure. Very cute and silly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: He's the man
customer_reviews.text: How could you not love a Funko Bob Ross? He brings fun and peace to our home. Have a problem? Just ask What would Bob Ross do????
customer_reviews.author: DnD

customer_reviews.title: Beat the devil out of it
customer_reviews.text: Cute office piece to show everyone my inner Bob Ross and beat the devil out of my office items.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a Bob Ross fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13 year old son who is obsessed with Bob Ross. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: AngelaS

customer_reviews.title: Its Bob
customer_reviews.text: This a great addition to my Funko collection!! stands fine and keeps me calm when I look at him
customer_reviews.author: J. Birkedal

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Was a grift for my friend and came in perfect shape!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Castillo

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Bob Ross Fans
customer_reviews.text: What started out as purchasing some gag gift purchases for my husbands who's a fan of Bob Ross, turned into finding out that Funko has a few different Bob Ross collectibles coming out this year. This was definitely a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerTop Contributor: Harry Potter

customer_reviews.title: Its Bob Ross!
customer_reviews.text: My thirteen year old grand daughter asked for this, which I thought was a little weird - but she got it as her valentines gift. Collectible item made of durable rubber/plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for people who love Bob Ross. They went crazy over it!!! It is really cute.
customer_reviews.author: mkmkm

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grand daughter for Christmas. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Christene Bates

customer_reviews.title: Bob Ross is the best
customer_reviews.text: This just makes me so happy! I have him in my office and he just fills me with joy. It definitely does a good job of representing the amazing Bob Ross
customer_reviews.author: MooGooGaiBoo

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this figure
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY got this! I grew up watching Bob Ross and I am an art teacher now so having anything Bob Ross is on my list. I absolutely love this figure.
customer_reviews.author: Rhodé Amira

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing Funko Pop!
customer_reviews.text: how can you possibly go wrong with a Bob Ross Funko Pop?! he is wonderful! :) details on it are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the trees he paints!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great figurine. I gave it to my wife and she went around her office showing it off to everyone. It was nice to give her this happy little cloud.
customer_reviews.author: LAWJR3

customer_reviews.title: Happy Little Bob
customer_reviews.text: Cute and nicely made little Bob who watches over my paintings and adds happy wherever he is placed
customer_reviews.author: PublicProfileName

customer_reviews.title: fun party gift
customer_reviews.text: fun gift for a party or secret santa. Everybody loves Bob. Easy and fits everyone! brings a chuckle to a crowd for sure.
customer_reviews.author: T. B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Bob is in my camper painting happy little clouds
customer_reviews.text: Bob is in my camper painting happy little clouds. Sometimes I find him in the strangest places. He has full run of our rv so it's fine with me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My only real issue is the box was a little damaged not horrible though.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted. My only real issue is the box was a little damaged not horrible though...the person I gave it to didn't mind. Other than that this was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amber G

customer_reviews.title: Birthday present
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband for his birthday and he really likes it. Has it on his desk at work.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Happy little trees.
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Solid. Love it. Makes me think, "happy little trees"
customer_reviews.author: I like to shop

customer_reviews.title: This is great! My husband is a big fan of Bob ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great! My husband is a big fan of Bob Ross so when I saw this I knew I had to get it for his office. I have a couple other Funko figurines and they're a fun way to represent your interests.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki D.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, very cute. It will stand on its own unlike other funko products.
customer_reviews.author: Skudrpi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my boss!
customer_reviews.text: When your boss wears a Bob Ross shirt to the company Christmas party, you get him the Bob Ross funko!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Meggs

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Cute , great price, fast shipping. My son loved it. However his gf bought him the exact one and gave it to him first so I may have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

product_meta.title: Funko Pop! Television: Bob Ross - Bob Ross Collectible Figure
product_meta.description: Design:SingleFrom the joy of painting, Bob Ross, as a stylized POP vinyl from Funko! Figure stands 3 3/4 inches and comes in a window display box. Check out the other television figures from Funko! Collect them all!
feature_bullets: From the joy of painting, Bob Ross, as a stylized POP vinyl from Funko!
Stylized collectable stands 3 ¾ inches tall, perfect for any Bob Ross fan!
Collect and display all television pop! Vinyl's and let our Bob Ross pop! Help you paint some happy little TREES!
